snippet: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals responds to a column by Nicholas D. Kristof.
abstract: Letter from Ingrid E Newkirk, president of People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals, comments on the Sept 9 Nicholas D Kristof Op-Ed column on an organic dairy farm's success.
lead_paragraph: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals responds to a column by Nicholas D. Kristof.

headline.main: Is Edie the Cow Happy? Don’t Bet the Farm on It
headline.print_headline: Is Edie the Cow Happy? Don’t Bet the Farm on It
